verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy holy
I will bow before
My Lord and King
Hallelujah
You have come to us
You make all things new

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Emmanuel
Jesus Christ
You'll never let me go
My Shepherd King
You're watching over me
Emmanuel

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So amazing
You have named the stars
Of the deepest night
Still You love me
You have called my name
I will follow You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Holy holy
God Almighty
There is none like You
